translations: <正式>时代思潮，时代精神（德语）

sentences.sentence: He has caught the zeitgeist of life in the 1960s very well indeed.
sentences.translation: 他确实非常准确地描绘出了20世纪60年代乡村生活的真实风貌。

sentences.sentence: This time, too, Sir Jim has captured the Zeitgeist.
sentences.translation: 这一次，吉姆再次把握住了时代潮流。

sentences.sentence: It is good at one thing, and for now the zeitgeist has turned against it.
sentences.translation: 它就有一件事做得好，可是现在时代思潮转向而不利于它了。
